subSections.title: Etymology
Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=yíng
|c=jing4
|h=pfs=ngiàng
|md=ngiàng/ngìng
|md_note=ngiàng - vernacular (“to parade through the streets; to become dry; to stick up”); ngìng - literary (“to welcome, to meet; to face; to flatter”)
|mn=ngiâ/gêng
|mn_note=ngiâ - vernacular (“to parade through the streets; to meet, to greet”); gêng - literary
|mn-t=ngêng5/ngiêng5
|mn-t_note=ngêng5 - Shantou; ngiêng5 - Chaozhou
|w=3nyin
|mc=1
|oc=1,1
|cat=v,pn
}}
